channel.title: Go Humble! RSS GAMES

item.title: Fulqrum Publishing Spring Break
item.description: Freaky fun times with Fulqrum Publishing
item.content:encoded: Explore the games of epic international devs, Fulqrum Publishing with our newest bundle of great titles. This collection brings the heatâ€”survive a moody Lovecraftian FPS world in Forgive Me Father. Get tactical with a fantasy setting and engaging RPG mechanics in Fell Seal: Arbiter's Mark. Embrace the darkness with the retro inspired RPG Stygian: Reign of the Old Ones. Play great games and help support nPower and The Global Foodbanking Network with your purchase!
